snippet.title: Zlime: Return Of Demon Lord - Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Zlime: Return of Demon Lord - World 4 is here! 🌋🔥

A new chapter unfolds in the Demon Realm!

New World: Volkaz Volcano - Conquer fiery challenges, defeat powerful bosses, and discover new monster forms and relics!
New Languages: Experience Zlime in Chinese (Simplified), Spanish, and Turkish!
Prepare to embark on a new journey and face off against Demon Lord Zenoth!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2583330/Zlime_Return_Of_Demon_Lord/
Twitter: https://x.com/DuoabTeamdev 
Discord: https://discord.gg/wQJ8vBM93m

#Zlime #Roguelike #Roguelite #GameDevelopment #indiegame #games
